title: Cation substitution effects (Mn, Ni, and Zn) on ZIF-67 derived spinel modified with 3DGO for the detection of NO2 gas with high sensitivity and selectivity
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3637-3656
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00205E, Paper
Banalata Maji, Adyasha Das, Bapun Barik, Priyabrat Dash
Detailed cation substitution studies of MCo2O4 (M = Mn, Ni, Zn) spinel structures supported on 3D graphene oxide via solvothermal method have been carried out and used as a highly sensitive and selective NO2 gas sensor at room temperature.
